column5: well the opener came in with a bang. mother nature gave us a whooping! 60k winds and snow. sunday was much nicer. t-bay area produced nice fishing. fish were spawned out where i fished. they were however, very finicky. slow presentations and 1-8 ounce jigs were the ticket. limits in 1 hour but VERY slow presentation. any one that fished saturday would have froze. better wheather to come and the fishing will only get better. ENJOY
